title: Calories in a Starburst
meta_description: Learn calories in starburst candy—one piece has about 10 kcal—plus carbs, sugars, fat, and nutrition tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Original fruit chew variety, one standard piece (~2.5 g), no wrappers or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Starburst piece provides about 10 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: One piece with 1/2 tsp peanut butter

faqs.q: How many calories in one Starburst?
What are the carbs in a Starburst?
faqs.a: Roughly 2.3 g carbs and 1.8 g sugars per piece, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Starburst have fat or protein?
faqs.a: 0 g fat and 0 g protein per piece—it's mostly sugar.

faqs.q: Calories in a pack of Starbursts?
faqs.a: A typical 8-piece pack has about 80 kcal; adjust by serving size.
Sugar-free versions have slightly more calories per piece (~12 kcal) but fewer sugars.
